keyMoments.title: Captain's Shadow Stolen
keyMoments.description: The crew's captain Luffy has his shadow stolen by Gecko Moria, creating a desperate crisis for the crew as Luffy becomes vulnerable to sunlight.
keyMoments.significance: A devastating blow to the crew that requires them to act quickly to save their captain and recover his shadow.

keyMoments.title: Crew Members Watch Helplessly
keyMoments.description: Nami, Usopp, and Chopper are forced to watch from hiding as their captain is defeated, unable to intervene without revealing themselves.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the crew's vulnerable position on Thriller Bark and their inability to protect their captain in this moment.

name.japanese: スリラーバーク海賊団

keyMoments.title: The Mysterious Four Gather
keyMoments.description: Moria meets with the other three members of the Mysterious Four (Hogback, Perona, and Absalom) in his chamber to discuss their operations.
keyMoments.significance: Showcases the leadership structure and group dynamics of Thriller Bark's ruling council.

keyMoments.title: Successfully Captures Luffy's Shadow
keyMoments.description: Captain Moria successfully steals the shadow of Straw Hat Luffy, marking a major victory for the crew.
keyMoments.significance: Major accomplishment that sets up the creation of their ultimate zombie and demonstrates the crew's power.
